participant_1.background:
I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.
anyways i decided to give it a try and participaed in an audition for a talent show.
I use makeup to help me feel more confident and powerful, even when my back is hurting.
i do not like broccoli.
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.

participant_2.background:
I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family.
I ran my first 5k race with my spouse and child cheering me on.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
my favorite mob player is barolo colon.
i am overall happy with life.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I just got back from a run.
That sounds fun! I'm not very athletic, but I love to go for walks.
That's great! I love to walk too. It's a great way to get some exercise and clear your head.
I agree! I also like to go for walks in nature. I find it to be very relaxing.
Me too! I love being outdoors. I'm lucky to live in a place with a lot of beautiful nature.
That's awesome! I'm sure you get to enjoy it a lot.
I do! I love taking pictures of the nature around me.
That's a great hobby! I love taking pictures too.
We should go on a walk together sometime and take pictures!
That would be fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good! Talk to you later!
